import React, { useContext } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import './CartItems.css' import { ShopContext } from '../../context/ShopContext' const CartItems = () => { const {getTotalCart, productData, cartItems, removeFromCart, isLoggedIn} = useContext(ShopContext); return (
